## Pack.open() method

Open Pack

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
open(tokenId: number, amount?: number): Promise<PackRewards>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  tokenId | number | the token ID of the pack you want to open |
|  amount | number | <i>(Optional)</i> the amount of packs you want to open |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;PackRewards&gt;

## Remarks

- Open a pack to reveal the contained rewards. This will burn the specified pack and the contained assets will be transferred to the opening users wallet.

## Example


```javascript
const tokenId = 0
const amount = 1
const tx = await contract.open(tokenId, amount);
```
